biotools.summary: MS Amanda is a scoring system to identify peptides out of tandem mass spectrometry data using a database of known proteins. It is especially designed for high resolution and high accuracy tandem mass spectra.

bioschemas.name: MS Amanda
bioschemas.summary: MS Amanda is a scoring system to identify peptides out of tandem mass spectrometry data using a database of known proteins. It is especially designed for high resolution and high accuracy tandem mass spectra.
